Package com.groep6.pfor.views

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BattleView
    BattleView.
    BoardView
    The view that shows the board
    HandView
    The view that represents a player's hand with cards
    HostView
    The view that show's the screen to create a lobby as a host
    InstructionView
    The view where the game's instructions are shown
    JoinView
    The view where you can join a lobby using a code, username and a password if required
    LobbyView
    The view that show's the lobby with players, before the game is started
    LoseView
    The view that shows that you lost the game :(
    MenuView
    The view that show's the menu where you can control the game settings
    MoveView  
    OptionsView
    Option screen to turn off music, switch to fullscreen and exit the game.
    RecruitBarbarianView  
    RecruitLegionView  
    RoleCardInfoView
    The view that shows the role card's information
    TradeView
    The view where you can trade cards with the trade deck
    View  
    WinView
    The view that shows that you won the game :D
